answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Matthew – I’ve attached a copy of Washoe County, NV’s 2010 Case Study “Animal Services – Creating a Win-Win
Reducing Costs While Improving Customer Service and Public Support” that I hope is helpful.
Good luck,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Matthew Eng
text:
Hi,
I'm researching different models and options for funding animal control/welfare operations and would like to know more about the models and options themselves (e.g., outsourcing all or parts of operations, taxing pet food or other pet supplies, restructing licensing fees, etc.) and the governments that have explored and/or employed them.
Thanks,
Matthew Eng
City of Seattle
title: Funding Animal Control/Welfare Operations
